issues.title: EPIC: App Setup & Profile Management
issues.body:
## Description
Core functionality for user profile setup and management

**Epic:** App Setup & Profile Management
**Priority:** High
**Estimate:** 8

issues.title: US1.1: App Installation and Launch
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want to install and launch the app with a clean interface so that I can begin using it right away.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- App installs successfully on both iOS and Android
- Splash screen displays app logo
- Main screen loads with basic navigation
- No crashes on startup

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Set up React Native project
- [ ] Configure basic navigation
- [ ] Create splash screen
- [ ] Test on both platforms

**Estimate:** 3
**Priority:** High

issues.title: US1.2: Create Basic Profile
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want to create a basic profile with my name, role, company, and social links, so that others can discover me.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Profile creation form with required fields
- Validation for required fields
- Ability to save profile
- Social links are optional

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Design profile form
- [ ] Implement form validation
- [ ] Add social links field
- [ ] Implement save functionality

**Estimate:** 5
**Priority:** High

issues.title: US1.3: Persistent Profile Storage
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want my profile data to be saved securely on my device so that I don't have to re-enter it every time.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Profile data persists between app launches
- Data is stored securely
- Profile can be edited and updated

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Set up AsyncStorage/MMKV
- [ ] Implement profile CRUD operations
- [ ] Add data encryption
- [ ] Test data persistence

**Estimate:** 3
**Priority:** High

issues.title: EPIC: Bluetooth Discovery Engine
issues.body:
## Description
Core functionality for Bluetooth-based peer discovery

**Epic:** Bluetooth Discovery Engine
**Priority:** High
**Estimate:** 15

issues.title: US2.1: BLE Profile Broadcasting
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want my device to broadcast my encoded profile using Bluetooth so others nearby can detect me.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Device broadcasts profile when discovery is active
- Profile is encoded for transmission
- Broadcast can be toggled on/off
- Low battery impact

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Set up react-native-ble-plx
- [ ] Implement profile encoding
- [ ] Create BLE advertising service
- [ ] Add toggle controls

**Estimate:** 5
**Priority:** High

issues.title: US2.2: Peer Scanning
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want to scan for nearby users broadcasting their profiles so I can see who's nearby.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Scans for nearby BLE devices
- Decodes received profiles
- Displays discovered users
- Handles scan timeouts

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Implement BLE scanning
- [ ] Create profile decoding
- [ ] Add scan timeout
- [ ] Test with multiple devices

**Estimate:** 5
**Priority:** High

issues.title: US2.3: Peer Expiration
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want the app to automatically expire peers from the list after a short timeout so I only see who's currently around.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Peers expire after 5 minutes of inactivity
- UI updates when peers expire
- Configurable timeout period
- Last seen timestamp displayed

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Implement peer expiration timer
- [ ] Add last seen timestamp
- [ ] Update UI on peer expiration
- [ ] Add settings for timeout

**Estimate:** 3
**Priority:** Medium

issues.title: US2.4: Discovery Session Control
issues.body:
## User Story
As a user, I want a clear button to start and stop peer discovery sessions so I have control over visibility.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Start/stop discovery button
- Clear visual state for active/inactive
- Battery usage indicator
- Quick toggle in notification area

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Design session controls
- [ ] Implement start/stop functionality
- [ ] Add battery usage indicator
- [ ] Create notification controls

**Estimate:** 3
**Priority:** High
